name: Indian Cuisines
description: The cuisine of India is one of the world's most diverse cuisines, characterized by its sophisticated and subtle use of the many spices, vegetables, grains and fruits grown across India.

recipes.name: Mango Lassi
recipes.description: Mango lassi is made from yogurt, milk and mango pulp. It may be made with or without added sugar. In various parts of Canada, mango lassi is a cold drink consisting of sweetened kesar mango pulp mixed with yogurt, cream, or ice cream.

ingredients.name: Mango
ingredients.description: Mangoes are juicy stone fruit (drupes) produced from numerous species of tropical trees belonging to the flowering plant genus Mangifera, cultivated mostly for this edible fruit.

utensils.name: Grinder
utensils.properties: It is compact on size and plays a major role in preparation of food. It usually comes with three jars crafted out of high quality stainless steel.
utensils.description: Grinder is an electronic kitchen appliance that used to mix and grind various food items

steps: Add all of the ingredients to the bowl of a blender.

Puree until smooth. Serve immediately!

Recommended Products
